youngAndEnthusiasticFullStackWebDevelope: Young and enthusiastic full-stack web developer
aboutMeText:
I have been working in the field of web development for over 3 years. I can solve non-trivial problems, plan work, design and program software.

My main skills are:

  • Front-end: JavaScript, Vue.js, React, Angular,
  • Back-end: TypeScript, TypeORM, SQL,
  • Automated testing: Cypress, Jest,
  • Design: UI, REST API, database,
  • Blockchain: Solidity, Remix, Web3,
  • Operating systems: Windows, Linux,
  • Git versioning system.
educationText: Successfully completed bachelor degree on Faculty of Information Technology at Brno University of Technology
SelfEmployedDescription:
I had a longer self-improvement vacation which was dedicated to personal development. It involved:

  • studying smart contracts development,
  • practising with Angular,
  • working as a mathematics, informatics, and physics online tutor ,
  • creating a parser bot for Telegram in Python,
  • trading cryptocurrencies,
  • developing soft skills,
  • restoring physical and mental health.
TFWorkDescription:
The scope of my work was design and implementation of UI, REST API and tests in JavaScript and TypeScript.

Projects:

  • frontend of application for managing software product settings, making payments and communicating with support,
  • frontend and backend of the internal company management system,
  • frontend and backend of application for transport company (tickets and goods sale, processing of applications for chip cards, etc.).

Additional:

  • created CSS animations,
  • developed application for Android with Flutter.
  • passed exam from the book “Clean Code”,
IWWorkDescription: The work at the startup included development of a CRM system for obtaining customer requirements for a web in PHP 7 language (Nette framework), SQL and JavaScript (jQuery framework). The CRM system was also a practical part of my bachelor's thesis.
hobbyText: Also, I like to dance lindy hop 💃🏼
imLookingForwardToYourReply: I look forward to your reply 🙂
